title: Defining Reinforcement Learning Down
description: It's a lot simpler than I realized.
content: On Monday, I described reformist reinforcement learning in a paragraph. Today Ill do it in about 800 words with no equations. Im indebted to Lior Fox, who, in a back-and-forth in the comment section,… [+4920 chars]
